T10subhrk_u:0: I. Puṇyaprotsāhanakathā mānuṣyaṃ samavāpya duṣkaraśatair labdhvā durāpaṃ kṣaṇaṃ mṛtyau niṣpratikāradāruṇatare nityaṃ puraḥsthāyini /
T10subhrk_u:1: pātheyaṃ damadānasaṃyamamayaṃ yair na prabhūtaṃ kṛtaṃ saṃsārogramaruprapātapatitāḥ prāpsyanti duḥkhāni te // SRKK_1 //
T10subhrk_u:3: bhavakṣaye matiḥ kāryā bhavopakaraṇeṣu vā // SRKK_2 //
T10subhrk_u:5: puṇyam evātra kurvīta yataś cintāmaṇir nṛṇām // SRKK_3 //
T10subhrk_u:7: puṇyaṃ tad vardhyasveha yasmād dhetuḥ sukhasya te // SRKK_4 //
T10subhrk_u:8: mānuṣyaṃ yadupāśrayeṇa bhavatā labdhaṃ punaḥ sāṃprataṃ rūpaudāryakulonnatiprabhṛtibhir yuktaṃ vicitrair guṇaiḥ /
T10subhrk_u:9: tat puṇyaṃ suhṛd eka eva jagatāṃ bandhuś ca janmāntare tasmāt tūrṇam idaṃ kuru tvam asakṛt sarvārthasaṃpatkaram // SRKK_5 //
T10subhrk_u:11: tāny eva puṇyāni vivardhayethā na karṣaṇīyo hy upakāripakṣaḥ // SRKK_6 //
T10subhrk_u:12: viramata pāpataḥ kuruta puṇyam udārataraṃ damayata durdamaṃ viṣayalolamanasturagam /
T10subhrk_u:13: bhavata munīndravat parahitābhiratāḥ satataṃ daśati na yāvad eva maraṇāhir asahyaviṣaḥ // // iti puṇyaprotsāhanakathā //
T10subhrk_u:14: II. Dharmaśravaṇaprotsāhanakathā jalanidhikūrmakanṭhayugarandhrasamāgamavat kṣaṇam anavāpyam adbhutam imaṃ samavetya calam /
T10subhrk_u:15: praśamapuraikavartma vinipātabhayāpaharaṃ śṛṇuta sudurlabhaṃ kṣaṇam apīha muner vacanam // yad durlabham kalpaśatair anekair mānuṣyam aṣṭākṣaṇadoṣamuktam /
T10subhrk_u:16: tat sāṃprataṃ prāptam ato bhavadbhiḥ kāryo hi dharmaśravaṇāya yatnaḥ //
T10subhrk_u:18: yo na cintayati karmasatpatham tasya janma bhavatīha niṣphalam // SRKK_10
T10subhrk_u:19: na narakagataiḥ pretais tiryaggatair vikalendriyair amaragurubhiḥ pratyantasthaiḥ kudṛkkaravikṣataiḥ
T10subhrk_u:20: munisavitari prajñālokena cānudite jine sanaravibudhaiḥ śakyaṃ pātuṃ munīndravacomṛtam // tasmāt kukāryam vyapahāya sarvaṃ matvā svakāryaṃ paramāryadharmam /
T10subhrk_u:21: śrotavya eva prayatena dharmo yasmād ataḥ sarvaguṇā bhavanti // SRKK_12 //
T10subhrk_u:22: maunīndraṃ vākyaratnam janayati sudhiyām etad ādau pramodaṃ śrotrāpāte tataś ca prabalagurughanadhvāntavṛndaṃ nihanti /
T10subhrk_u:23: cintādhyānāvasāne sphuṭayati sakalam janmacakraprabandhaṃ niḥśeṣātaṅkapaṅktiṃ vighaṭayati sadā sarvasaṃpannidhānam // SRKK_13 //
T10subhrk_u:25: tad idam evam avetya muner vacaḥ śṛṇuta saṃprati nirmalamānasāḥ // SRKK_14
T10subhrk_u:27: III. Durlabhamanuṣyakatha yat prāpya janmajaladher api yānti pāram āropayanti śivam uttamabodhibījam
T10subhrk_u:28: cintāmaṇer api samabhyadhikaṃ guṇaughair mānuṣyakaṃ ka iha tad viphalī karoti // SRKK_15 //
T10subhrk_u:29: yo manuṣyaṃ kuśalavibhavaiḥ prāpya kalpair analpair mohāt puṇyadraviṇam iha na svalpam apy ācinoti /
T10subhrk_u:30: so 'smāl lokāt param upagatas tīvram abhyeti śokaṃ
T10subhrk_u:31: ratnadvīpād vaṇig iva gataḥ svaṃ gṛhaṃ śūnyahastaḥ // SRKK_16 //
T10subhrk_u:33: alabhyamāne mānuṣye duḥkham eva kutaḥ sukham // SRKK_17 //
T10subhrk_u:34: nātaḥ paraṃ vañcanāsti na ca moho 'sty ataḥ param /
T10subhrk_u:35: yad īdṛśaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prāpya na kuryāt kuśalaṃ bahu // SRKK_18 //
T10subhrk_u:37: naikajanmakṛtāt pāpāt kā punaḥ sugatau kathā // SRKK_19 //
T10subhrk_u:42: kīrtir uttamaguṇāś ca yuvatyo dānataḥ kathitam etad aśesam // SRKK_21 //
T10subhrk_u:43: ājñādīptir bhogasaṃpat prakṛṣṭā rūpaudāryaṃ varṇamādhuryam ojaḥ /
T10subhrk_u:44: vāksaubhāgyaṃ kāntir ārogyam āyus tat tad dānād iṣṭam iṣṭaṃ phalaṃ ca //
T10subhrk_u:45: aśvāḥ kṣaumāṇi nāgā bahukusumasitaṃ cāmaraṃ cātapatraṃ saudhaṃ saṃgītigarbhaṃ madhupaṭaharavāḥ puṣpamālā yuvatyaḥ /
T10subhrk_u:46: bhojyaṃ ratnāni hārāḥ puranagaramahīṃ kuṅkumaṃ devalokaḥ saṃbuddhatvaṃ ca buddhaiḥ kathitam iha phalaṃ dānakalpadrumasya // SRKK_23
T10subhrk_u:48: dāsyaṃ yānti vikampitastanataṭā vyāvalgitabhrūlatās tan mātsaryakapāṭapāṭanapaṭor dānasya visphūrjitam // SRKK_24 //
T10subhrk_u:49: aśvaiś cāmarabhāranāmitaśirorūpaiḥ khalīnonmukhair nāgair bhinnamadaiś ca yan naravarā gacchanti chattrocchrayaiḥ /
T10subhrk_u:50: bhṛtyaiḥ sābharaṇaiḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭair abhyarcyamānāḥ sadā tad dānasya phalaṃ vadanti munayaḥ pūrvārjitasyedṛśam // SRKK_25 //
T10subhrk_u:51: hārair vajravicitrahemavalayair yat pārthivā bhūṣitāḥ keyūrair mukuṭaiś ca ratnakhacitaiḥ siṃhāsanasthāḥ sadā /
T10subhrk_u:53: tad dānasya phalaṃ vadanti munayaḥ śārdūlavikrīḍitam // SRKK_26 //
T10subhrk_u:55: yac chakro ramate śacīsahacaro yoṣitsahasrākule tad dānasya phalaṃ vadanti munayaḥ pūrvārjitasyedṛśam dātā priyatvam upayāti janasya śaśvat saṃsevyate ca baḥubhiḥ samupetya sadbhiḥ /
T10subhrk_u:56: kīrtiś ca dikṣu visaraty amalaṃ yaśo 'sya tat tat padaṃ samupayāti viśārado 'sau // SRKK_28
T10subhrk_u:57: bhedāt kāyasya deveṣv avikalavividhottaptabhogāspadeṣu prāpyotpattiṃ vicitrastabakakusumitasphītakalpadrumeṣu
T10subhrk_u:58: udyāneṣu prakāmaṃ suciram atisukhaṃ nandanādiṣv akhinnaḥ prāpnoty utkṛṣṭarūpāmarayuvatijanaiḥ sevyamānaḥ pradānāt // SRKK_29 //
T10subhrk_u:59: dānaṃ nāma mahānidhānam anugaṃ caurādyasādhāraṇaṃ dānaṃ matsaralobhadoṣarajasaḥ prakṣālaṇaṃ cetasaḥ /
T10subhrk_u:60: saṃsārādhvapariśramāpanayanaṃ dānaṃ sukhaṃ vāhanaṃ dānaṃ naikasukhopadhānasumukhaṃ sanmitram ātyantikam // SRKK_30 //
T10subhrk_u:62: yad dāsyaṃ svayam aṅganāḥ sukṛtinām āyānti pīnoravas tan māhātmyam uvāca saṃbhṛtaphalaṃ dānasya śauddhodaniḥ // SRKK_31 //
T10subhrk_u:63: paryasyatsahakārabhaṅgasurabhi preṅkhannimagnotpalaṃ śrīmatkāñcanabhājane vinihutaṃ bandhūkatāmraṃ madhu /
T10subhrk_u:64: kāminyā śapathopanītam asakṛd yat pīyate kāminā hetuṃ tatra vadanti śuddhamatayo dānaṃ paraṃ śreyasaḥ // SRKK_32 //
T10subhrk_u:65: iti dānaguṇān niśamya saumya prayatātmā kuru dāna eva yatnam /
T10subhrk_u:66: tribhavogramahābhaye narāṇāṃ na hi dānāt param asti bandhur anyaḥ //
T10subhrk_u:68: V. Puṇyakathā yad dṛśyate jagati cārutaraṃ priyaṃ vā rūpaṃ kulaṃ priyajano vibhavāḥ sukhaṃ vā /
T10subhrk_u:69: tat puṇyaśilpikṛtam eva vadanti santaḥ kalyāṇakāripuruṣasya na puṇyatulyam // SRKK_34 //
T10subhrk_u:71: uddhūtacāmaravirājitagātraśobhāḥ puṇyādhikāḥ kṣitibhujo bhuvi saṃcaranti // SRKK_35 //
T10subhrk_u:73: yat ke cid eva puruṣāḥ śriyam udvahanti puṇyasya pūrvacaritasya kṛtajñatā sā // SRKK_36 //
T10subhrk_u:74: āyuḥ sudīrghaṃ sukule ca janma kāntaṃ vapur vyādhibhayaṃ na cāsti /
T10subhrk_u:75: dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ parivārasaṃpad bhavanti puṇyasya mahāvipākāḥ // SRKK_37
T10subhrk_u:76: yac cakravartī pravarais tu ratnaiḥ sahasraputraiś ca samanvito 'pi
T10subhrk_u:77: samudrasīmāṃ bubhuje dharitrīṃ tat puṇyaratnasya phalaṃ viśālam // SRKK_38
T10subhrk_u:79: yad brahmalokaṃ tv abhibhūya tejasā brahmā sadā bhāti tad eva puṇyataḥ //
T10subhrk_u:81: saṃpūjyate devaguruḥ sadaiva tat puṇyaratnasya phalaṃ viśālam // SRKK_40
T10subhrk_u:82: rūpaṃ vīryaṃ ca śilpaṃ ca vihāya vivaśā narāḥ /
T10subhrk_u:83: paralokam ito yānti karmavāyubhir īritāḥ // SRKK_41 //
T10subhrk_u:84: puṇyaṃ tv ekam ihātyantam anugāmi sukhodayam /
T10subhrk_u:85: puṇyam anyair ahāryatvād dhanānāṃ pravaraṃ dhanam // SRKK_42 //
T10subhrk_u:86: ye merum api vegena vikiranti diśo daśa /
T10subhrk_u:87: te 'pi puṇyasya bhaṅgāya nālaṃ pralayavāyavaḥ // SRKK_43 //
T10subhrk_u:89: puṇyaṃ na kledam āyāti catuḥsāgaravāriṇā // SRKK_44 //
T10subhrk_u:91: kṣitau vā dahyamānāyāṃ puṇyam ekaṃ na dahyate // SRKK_45 //
T10subhrk_u:93: VI. Bimbakathā āḍhyo nirnaṣṭaśokaḥ kṣatasakalakalir locanānandapātraṃ saubhāgyaśrīnidhānaṃ samupacitabalākrāntagātro yaśasvī/
T10subhrk_u:94: tejasvī kāntarūpaḥ pravacanacaturo dāntasarvendriyāśvo vyakto dhīmān pradātā bhavati bhagavato buddhabimbaṃ vidhāya // SRKK_46 //
T10subhrk_u:95: yāvantaḥ paramāṇavo bhagavataḥ stūpeṣu bimbeṣu vā tatkartur divi bhūtale ca niyataṃ tāvanti rājyāny api /
T10subhrk_u:96: rūpārūpyasamādhisaṃpad akhilaṃ bhuktvā ca sarvaṃ sukham ante janmajarāvipattirahitaṃ prāpnoti bauddhaṃ padam // SRKK_47 //
T10subhrk_u:98: bhavej jino 'nte jitadoṣaśatruḥ tāthāgatīṃ yaḥ pratimāṃ vidhatte //
T10subhrk_u:100: janma mānuṣyakaṃ vaṃśa uccair ādeyavākyatā // SRKK_49 //
T10subhrk_u:102: sthāneṣv abhiniveśaś ca rāgādibhir abādhanā // SRKK_50 //
T10subhrk_u:104: vidhāya buddhapratimāṃ stūpaṃ vā prāṇināṃ sadā // SRKK_51 //
T10subhrk_u:105: na yāti dāsyaṃ na daridrabhāvaṃ na preṣyatāṃ nāpi ca hīnajanma /
T10subhrk_u:106: na cāpi vaikalyam ihendriyāṇāṃ yo lokanāthapratimāṃ karoti // SRKK_52 //
T10subhrk_u:108: VII. Snānakathā nānāgandhaiḥ sugandhaiḥ snapayati sugataṃ puṣpadhūpāṅgarāgair
T10subhrk_u:109: yo vā pūjāṃ karoti pramuditamanasā śravyavāditraśabdaiḥ /
T10subhrk_u:111: vyāptāyāṃ snāti so 'nte sakalakalimalakṣālito yāti mokṣam // SRKK_53 //
T10subhrk_u:113: mandākinyāṃ suraughāḥ pratidinam udakakrīḍayā yad ramante nānāgandhodakena snapanaphalam idaṃ buddhabhaṭṭārakasya // SRKK_54 //
T10subhrk_u:115: snapanam idaṃ ya eva vidadhāti muner manujaḥ sa bhavati vītamānasamalo jagur astamalāḥ // // iti snānakathā //
T10subhrk_u:116: VIII. Kuṅkumādikathā majjadvāravilāsinīkarakucaśroṇyūruvisphāritāṃ yat sphītasphuṭapaṅkajāṃ surapatir mandākinīṃ gāhate /
T10subhrk_u:117: kāntābhiḥ smaravihvalābhir asakṛl lokottamāyādarāt tad gandhodakapādyadhūpakusumasraggandhadānāt phalam // SRKK_56 //
T10subhrk_u:118: yad rājā cakravartī viyati gataghanaiḥ kuṅkumāmbhaḥpravāhaiḥ karpūrāmodavadbhir malayajasurabhiśleṣaśītair yutāyām /
T10subhrk_u:119: gaṅgāyām aṅgasaukhyaṃ paramam anubhavan modate sundarībhis tat tyāgāt kuṅkumāder guṇamaṇinidhaye buddhabhaṭṭārakāya // SRKK_57 //
T10subhrk_u:121: śṛṇoti śabdān suramānuṣāṇāṃ śrotraṃ ca divyaṃ labhate viśiṣṭam // SRKK_58

T10subhrk_u:130: cāturdvīpakacakravartyavanipā yad yānti khe līlayā tat tāthāgatadhātucaityakusumacchattrapradānāt phalam // SRKK_61 //

T10subhrk_u:135: śākrīṃ samantād adhigamya lakṣmīṃ dvīpāṃś ca bhuktvā caturo narendrāḥ /

T10subhrk_u:137: dṛśyante kāntimantaḥ śaśadharavadanāḥ subhruvo dīrghanetrā martyā yan martyaloke varakanakanibhāḥ kṣāntisauratyayuktāḥ /
T10subhrk_u:138: pṛthvīṃ yac cāpi rājā jalanidhivasanāṃ pālayaṃś cakravartī tat sarvaṃ buddhabimbe bhavati tanubhṛtāṃ dhātum āropya bhaktyā // SRKK_64
T10subhrk_u:140: XI. Maṇḍalakathā bhavati kanakavarṇaḥ sarvarogair vimuktaḥ suramanujaviśiṣṭaś candravad dīptakāntiḥ
T10subhrk_u:143: te prāpnuvanti sahasaiva janādhipatyaṃ dīrghāyuṣo vividharogabhayair vimuktāḥ /
T10subhrk_u:144: buddhasya ye hi bhuvanatrayapūjitasya kṛtvā bhavanti kusumaiḥ saha maṇḍalāni // SRKK_66 //
T10subhrk_u:145: dānaṃ gomayam ambunā ca sahitaṃ śīlaṃ ca saṃmārjanaṃ kṣāntiḥ kṣudrapipīlikāpanayanaṃ vīryaṃ kriyotthāpanam /
T10subhrk_u:146: dhyānaṃ tatkṣaṇam ekacittakaraṇaṃ prajñā surekhojjvalā etāḥ pāramitāḥ ṣaḍ eva labhate kṛtvā muner maṇḍalam // SRKK_67 //
T10subhrk_u:147: divyaiḥ sukhaiḥ sakalabhogavaraiś ca yuktā martyā bhavanti kanakādhikacāruvarṇāḥ /
T10subhrk_u:148: padmānanāḥ svavikalāṅgaviśālanetrāḥ puṣpair gaṇasya vividhair vasudhāṃ vicitrya // SRKK_68
T10subhrk_u:152: bhāsvatkāñcanabhājaneṣu nihitām aśnanti divyāṃ sudhāṃ tad buddhapramukhāryasaṃghaviṣaye nyastānnadānāt phalam // SRKK_69 //
T10subhrk_u:153: maitryā yaḥ saha kiṃkaraiḥ smararipuṃ nirjitya vajrāsane kleśārīn api yo durantaviṣayān antaścarān durjanān /
T10subhrk_u:154: skandhārātim api prasahya sugato mṛtyuṃ ca nītvā vaśaṃ prāptaḥ sarvarasāgrabhogavaśitāṃ so 'py annadānodayāt // SRKK_70 //
T10subhrk_u:156: āyur balaṃ varṇam udārarūpaṃ prāpnoti vidvān aśanapradānāt // SRKK_71 //
T10subhrk_u:157: nirjitya śatrūn balavīryayuktān lakṣmīṃ samāsādya ca ye narendrāḥ /

T10subhrk_u:160: XIII. Pānakathā preṅkhannīlasarojagarbham amalaṃ yat padmarāgāruṇaṃ kāmyaṃ kāñcanabhājane vinihitaṃ prāleyamiśraṃ madhu /
T10subhrk_u:161: kiṃcittāmravilocanapriyatamāpratyarpitaṃ pīyate saṃgītadhvanisaṃgataṃ naravarais tat pānadānāt phalam // SRKK_73 //

T10subhrk_u:163: pānaṃ prītiprasaktāḥ saha madhu madhuraṃ mādhavaṃ vā pibanti proktaṃ prājñaiḥ phalaṃ tad guṇanicitagaṇe pānadānasya ramyam // SRKK_74
T10subhrk_u:164: yat pānaṃ varṇagandhaprabhṛtiguṇayutaṃ kalpitaṃ tṛḍvināśi śleśmāghātogravātapraśamanacaturaṃ pipphalīkhaṇḍacūrṇam /

T10subhrk_u:166: madhumadhuram udāram ādareṇa pravaragaṇāya dadāti pānakaṃ yaḥ /

T10subhrk_u:168: śraddhāprasannamanaso bhuvi ye manuṣyāḥ saṃghāya pānakavaraṃ pradiśanti kāle /
T10subhrk_u:169: saṃsāraparvatadarītaṭavāsasaṃsthās te prāpnuvanti satataṃ madhuraṃ supānam
T10subhrk_u:172: yacchanti lokagurave sagaṇottamāya te prāpnuvanty abhimatapravarāmbarāṇi

T10subhrk_u:174: sa prāpnoti hrīvasanaṃ vastravariṣṭhaṃ kāṣāyaṃ ca kleśakaṣāyapratipakṣam
T10subhrk_u:175: dattvā satpiṅgacitrastabakaviracitā nīlapītāvadātai raktair anyaiś ca ramyaiḥ suruciravasanaiś cīvaraiś cārumālāḥ /
T10subhrk_u:176: divyaṃ vāmuktavastraṃ sugatasutagaṇāyābhirūpo manojño hrīvastrālaṃkṛtātmā bhavati paṭumatiḥ sarvadharmeśvaraḥ saḥ // SRKK_80 //

T10subhrk_u:179: śatrūn vijitya rabhasā satataṃ bhavanti saṃghasya ye sukusumaiḥ prakiranti pūjām // SRKK_81

T10subhrk_u:357: yo bhraṣṭaśīlavinayasya vināśakāle trāsaḥ samāviśati śīlavato na so 'sti /
T10subhrk_u:358: tasmāt prahṛṣṭavinayaḥ paralokam ante yo gantum icchati sa rakṣatu śīlam eva // SRKK_163 //
T10subhrk_u:359: śīlena niścayadṛḍhena divaṃ prayāti nātmaklamena na kudṛṣṭikṛtair vimārgaiḥ /
T10subhrk_u:360: tasmād ṛte 'pi vanavāsam ṛte 'pi liṅgaṃ yaḥ svargam icchati sa rakṣatu
T10subhrk_u:362: śīlaṃ vināśaharaṇāvaraṇādirakṣā śīlaṃ dhanaṃ paramam āryam ahāryam anyaiḥ /
T10subhrk_u:363: śīlaṃ sthiraṃ vyupaśame 'py anugāmi mitraṃ śīlaṃ vibhūṣaṇam ṛte 'pi
T10subhrk_u:365: na hy asti śīlasadṛśaṃ hitakāri mitraṃ snigdhāśayo na khalu śīlasamo 'sti
T10subhrk_u:367: mātā pitā ca tanayāya vidhātum icched yaḥ śīlam ūrjitaphalaṃ hitam ādadhātu // SRKK_166 //
T10subhrk_u:369: XXIV. Kṣāntikathā sarvam etat sucaritaṃ dānaṃ sugatapūjanam /
T10subhrk_u:370: kṛtaṃ kalpasahasrair yat pratighaḥ pratihanti tat // SRKK_167 //
T10subhrk_u:371: na ca dveṣasamaṃ pāpaṃ na ca kṣāntisamaṃ tapaḥ /
T10subhrk_u:372: tasmāt kṣāntiṃ prayatnena bhāvayed vividhair nayaiḥ // SRKK_168 //
T10subhrk_u:373: manaḥ śamaṃ na gṛhṇāti na prītisukham aśnute /
T10subhrk_u:374: na nidrāṃ na dhṛtiṃ yāti dveṣaśalye hṛdi sthite // SRKK_169 //
T10subhrk_u:375: na dviṣantaḥ kṣayaṃ yānti yāvajjīvam api ghnataḥ /
T10subhrk_u:376: krodham ekaṃ tu yo hanyāt tena sarvadviṣo hatāḥ // SRKK_170 //
T10subhrk_u:378: dahaty ātmānam evādau paraṃ dhakṣyati vā na vā // SRKK_171 //
T10subhrk_u:379: jarā rūpavatāṃ krodhaḥ tamaś cakṣuṣmatām api/
T10subhrk_u:380: vadho dharmārthakāmānāṃ tasmāt krodhaṃ nivārayet // SRKK_172 //
T10subhrk_u:381: matkarmacoditā hy ete jātā mayy apakāriṇaḥ /
T10subhrk_u:382: yena yāsyanti narakān mayaivaite hatā nanu // SRKK_173 //
T10subhrk_u:383: etān āśritya me pāpaṃ kṣīyate kṣamato bahu /
T10subhrk_u:384: mām āśritya tu yānty ete narakān dīrghavedanān // SRKK_174 //
T10subhrk_u:386: kasmād viparyayaṃ kṛtvā khalacetaḥ prakupyasi // SRKK_175 //
T10subhrk_u:387: mukhyaṃ daṇḍādikaṃ hitvā prerake yadi kupyasi /
T10subhrk_u:388: dveṣeṇa preritaḥ so 'pi dveṣe dveṣo 'stu me varam // SRKK_176 //
T10subhrk_u:390: XXV. Vīryakathā vīryaṃ hi sarvaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtaṃ sarvāpadas tarati vīryamahāplavena /
T10subhrk_u:391: naivāsti taj jagati vastu vicintyamānaṃ nāvāpnuyād yad iha vīryarathādhirūḍhaḥ // SRKK_177
T10subhrk_u:393: hatvā ripūñ jayam anuttamam āpnuvanti visphūrjitaṃ tad iha vīryamahābhaṭasya // SRKK_178 //
T10subhrk_u:395: vīryeṇa goṣpadam iva pravilaṅghya śūrāḥ kurvanty anarghaguṇaratnadhanārjanāni // SRKK_179
T10subhrk_u:396: rāgādīn uragān ivogravapuṣo viṣkambhavīryānvitāḥ śīlaṃ sajjanacittanirmalataraṃ samyak samādāpayan
T10subhrk_u:397: martyāḥ kāntatareṣu meruśikharopānteṣu vīryānvitā modante surasundarībhujalatāpāśopagūḍhāś ciram // SRKK_180 //
T10subhrk_u:398: yad devā viyati vimānavāsino ye nirdvandvāḥ samanubhavanti saumanasyam /
T10subhrk_u:399: atyantaṃ vipulaphalaprasūtihetor vīryasya sthiravihitasya sā vibhūtiḥ //
T10subhrk_u:401: XXVI. Dhyānakathā kleśārivargaṃ tv abhibhūya dhīrāḥ saṃbodhilakṣmīpadam āpnuvanti /
T10subhrk_u:402: bodhyaṅgadānaṃ pradiśanti sadbhyo dhyānaṃ hi tatra pravadanti hetum //
T10subhrk_u:404: ākāśatulyamanasaḥ samaloṣṭahemā dhyānād bhavanti manujā guṇahetubhūtāḥ //
T10subhrk_u:405: jitvā kleśārivṛndaṃ śubhabalamathane sarvathālabdhalakṣyaṃ prāptāḥ saṃbodhilakṣmīṃ pravaraguṇamayīṃ durlabhām anyabhūtaiḥ /
T10subhrk_u:406: sattve jñānādhipatyaṃ vigataripubhayāḥ kurvate yan narendrā dhyānaṃ tatraikahetuṃ sakalaguṇanidhiṃ prāhur āryā guṇaughāḥ // SRKK_184
T10subhrk_u:407: mohāndhakāraṃ pravidārya śaśvaj jñānāvabhāsaṃ kurute samantāt /
T10subhrk_u:408: saṃbuddhasūryaḥ suramānuṣāṇāṃ hetuḥ sa tatra pravaraḥ samādhiḥ // SRKK_185
T10subhrk_u:410: XXVII. Prajñākathā prajñādhanena vikalaṃ tu narasya rūpam ālekhyarūpam iva sāravihīnam antaḥ
T10subhrk_u:411: buddhyānvitasya phalam iṣṭam udeti vīryād vīryaṃ tu buddhirahitaṃ svavadhāya śatruḥ // SRKK_186
T10subhrk_u:413: madhyāntavidyo 'pi janaḥ pravetti prajñābalaṃ tat kathayanti tajjñāḥ //
T10subhrk_u:414: yad buddho martyaloke malatimiragaṇaṃ dārayitvā mahāntaṃ jñānālokaṃ karoti praharati ca sadā doṣavṛndaṃ narāṇām /
T10subhrk_u:415: ādeṣṭā cendriyāṇāṃ paramanujamano vetti sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ prajñāṃ tatrāpi nityaṃ śubhavarajananīṃ hetum utkīrtayanti // SRKK_188 //
T10subhrk_u:416: kāryārṇave cāpi drdhaṃ nimagnāḥ saṃgrāmamadhye manujāḥ pradhānāḥ /
T10subhrk_u:417: prajñāvaśāt te vijayaṃ labhante prajñā yataḥ sā śubhahetubhūtā // SRKK_189
T10subhrk_u:418: tasmāt sarvaguṇārthasādhanakarī prajñaiva saṃvardhyatāṃ na prajñāvikalā vibhānti puruṣāḥ prātaḥ pradīpā iva /
T10subhrk_u:419: [matvaivaṃ svaparātmabhadracaraṇe saddharmasaṃsādhane jitvā kleśagaṇāñ chubhārthaniratāḥ krīḍantu dharmārthinaḥ //] 190 //
T10subhrk_u:421: svargāpavargaguṇaratnanidhānabhūtā etāḥ ṣaḍ eva bhuvi pāramitā narāṇām /
T10subhrk_u:422: jñātvā naraḥ svahitasādhanatatparaḥ san kuryān na kaḥ satatam āsu. dṛḍhaṃ prayatnam // SRKK_191
